channel.title: Jingxiao Cai's Blog
channel.description: Personal blog about ML Infrastructure, distributed systems, and tech.

item.title: Getting OneDrive Working with Self-Hosted AI Agents: A Survival Story
item.description: The frustrating journey of getting OneDrive to work with a self-hosted AI agent — and the MultCloud workaround that finally worked.

item.title: Setting Up Google APIs for Self-Hosted AI Agents
item.description: Step-by-step guide to setting up Google APIs (Gmail, Calendar, Drive) for self-hosted AI agents. Includes OAuth 2.0 setup and security tips.

item.title: Migrating from WordPress to GitHub Pages
item.description: Why I migrated my blog from WordPress to GitHub Pages — the benefits of Jekyll, static sites, and full control over your content.

item.title: Welcome to My Blog
item.description: After several years in industry, I'm starting to share my learnings, thoughts, and experiences.
